episode.title: Put a Nipple on It
episode.rawTitle: 135: ‘Put a Nipple on It’ With Adam Lisagor
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Adam Lisagor returns to the show. Topics include the new Apple TV (why we both love it, despite several 1.0 flaws), 4K video, 3D movies, and Adam’s excellent new series “Computer Show”.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Adam Lisagor returns to the show. Topics include the new Apple TV (why we both love it, despite several 1.0 flaws), 4K video, 3D movies, and Adam’s excellent new series “Computer Show”.
